data.text: Asafi a bɛtina.
Koni fayida n bata yi tantan,
Amasɔtɔ n yi wasodene maxɔxɔlɔnma nun
E mi kɔntɔfilixi sese ra mumɛ!
E mi sɔxɔlɛxi sese ra alo bonne.
Nanara, wasona e yi
Turena e fatini
E gelen muxune ma,
E fala ɲaxine tima Ala ma,
Nanara, yamaan biraxi e fɔxɔ ra,
E naxa, “Ala nanse kolon?
Muxu ɲaxine na kii nin.
Nayi, n luxi tinxinyani nɛn fuu!
N tɔrɔxi lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ!
Xa n yi falan ti alo e tan,
Nanara, n yi kata feni ito famudeni,
Han n so Alaa yire sariɲanxini waxatin naxan yi,
Ala, i e tima yire salaxunxin nin,
Nba, e halagima nɛn mafurɛn,
E luxi nɛn alo xiyena
N bɔɲɛn yi sɔxɔlɛxi waxatin naxan yi,
n yi daxuyaan nun xaxilitareyani.
Koni hali na,
i ti n yɛɛ ra i ya maxadine xɔn,
Nde n malima kore xɔnna ma,
N fati bɛndɛn nun n niin taganɲɛ nɛn,
Naxanye e makuyaxi i ra,
Koni a rafan n tan ma,
